recipesJson.name: Country Apples (Apple Filling, Thai, Caramel, Butter Toffee, Pear, Pop)
recipesJson.author: NonStopMix
recipesJson.description:
Warm baked gooey apple glaze with light cinnamon and sweet brown sugar. A bunch of apples put together carefully to pull this off.

I did update this recipe 12/21

Give it 3 days to come together or vape it right after mixing.

If you mix this, please review and comment.

reviews.text: I'm glad I had faith in this one. Literally right off the shake this is on par with actual cooked apples. I was a bit scared of the apple filling at this % but it works well if you enjoy cinnamon, which I do. Wonderful apple flavour. Exactly what I've been looking for. I'd love to play with some custards, creams or crumble toppings with this. Well done, this is a wonderful mix and the taste in your tongue is like the real thing :) this is what FLV Apple Filling SHOULD taste like and if it steeps well you could just make a base flavour out of this for apple desserts üôÇ üçè
